The family lived in a modest house, reflecting their middle-class status. There is no evidence of any inherited privileges or disadvantages.
column9: "The Biography of Shao Yichen" by Zhang Xuecheng, "The Social Structure of Late Qing Dynasty China" by Li Bozhong.
